attacks.name: Limited Delivery
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Technical Machine or Pokémon Tool card show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Kick Away
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon, if any. (Do the damage before switching Pokémon.)
